item.title: About
item.description: 110 rue Pierre Decoster 1190 Forest +33 6 61 99 73 76 user1020007@protonmail.com Julien Ortuno 26 / 07 / 1995, Orsay, Essonne, France. 2018 – 2021 Collectif Fenêtre Ovale Bruxelles Organisation de concerts, d’ateliers, et d’émissions radios s’intéressant aux phénomènes sonores en lien avec le vivant 2018 – 2021 OpenLab for Bioacoustic Bruxelles Discussions et organisation d’événements autour de la relation entre le son et le vivant 2019 – 2020 Atelier radios avec le collectif Warmbed Bruxelles

item.title: welcome
item.description: Open Lab for Bio-Acoustics is a space dedicated to ecosystem acoustic research and monitoring. It’s aim is to cross disciplines and knowledge between field recordists, hackers, scientists, engineers, taxonomists, environmental activists passionate of living beings and natural systems. Through exchange we hope to create relationships, networks for creativity, to raise awareness on the current ecosystem failure and the decline of species diversity.
